title: 'A Good Choice for Normal to Oily Hair'
body: 'Park Avenue Beer Shampoo is a good shampoo for people with normal to oily hair. It cleanses the hair and scalp well and leaves the hair feeling soft and manageable. The shampoo also has a pleasant beer fragrance. However some people may find the shampoo to be too drying for their hair.  **Pros:**  * Cleans the hair and scalp well * Leaves the hair feeling soft and manageable * Has a pleasant beer fragrance  **Cons:**  * May be too drying for some people  Overall Park Avenue Beer Shampoo is a good shampoo for people with normal to oily hair. It is affordable and easy to find. However people with dry hair may want to try a different shampoo.'
